amendment.description: To provide real national security, restore United States leadership, and implement tough and smart policies to win the war on terror.

action.text: Amendment SA 4936 proposed by Senator Reid.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4936.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 4936 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 57. Record Vote Number: 243.
Amendment SA 4936 ruled out of order by the chair.
